mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dogs(dogorder, dname, email, sex, dogcd, age, neutral, size, mainphoto, weight, dog_detail, gamereg, purpose) VALUES(#{dogorder}, #{dname}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{dogcd}, #{age}, #{neutral}, #{size}, #{mainphoto}, #{weight}, #{dog_detail}, #{gamereg}, #{purpose})

INSERT INTO member(email, name, nickname, password, birth, sex, phone, post, addr, detailaddr, signdate, memgrade, datearea, location, userphoto) VALUES(#{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{birth}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{post}, #{addr}, #{detailaddr}, DATE(NOW()), 'A', '전국', '0000', #{userphoto})
mapper.select: SELECT dogorder, dname, sex, dogcd, age, neutral, size, mainphoto, weight, dog_detail, gamereg, purpose, pic1, pic2, pic3 FROM dogs A INNER JOIN dogpics B ON A.email = B.email WHERE A.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dogpics(email, pic1, pic2, pic3) VALUES(#{email}, #{pic1}, #{pic2}, #{pic3})
